## ðŸš¨ Reporting a Vulnerability

We take security seriously. If you discover a security vulnerability, please follow these steps:

### Do NOT
- âŒ Open a public GitHub issue
- âŒ Discuss in public channels
- âŒ Exploit the vulnerability

### Do
1. **Report privately** via [GitHub Security Advisories](https://github.com/ORG/REPO/security/advisories/new)
2. **Or email** security@example.com with:
   - Description of the vulnerability
   - Steps to reproduce
   - Potential impact
   - Suggested fix (if any)

### What to Expect
- **Response time:** Within 48 hours
- **Updates:** Every 72 hours until resolved
- **Resolution:** We aim to fix critical issues within 7 days

### Recognition
We appreciate responsible disclosure and will:
- Credit you in the security advisory (unless you prefer anonymity)
- Add you to our Hall of Fame
- Provide a bounty for critical vulnerabilities (if applicable)

## ðŸ›¡ï¸ Security Best Practices

When contributing, please ensure:
- No secrets in code
- Input validation on all user inputs
- Parameterized database queries
- Secure dependencies (run `npm audit`)
- Follow OWASP guidelines

Thank you for helping keep our project secure!  ðŸ™
